title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Skills: Blended Learning-Based Managerial Leadership for PLC Technology Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design simple control systems using PLC programming basic syntax (LADDER, ST).
Learners can perform problem-solving processes for PLC-based automated systems with over 80% accuracy via simulation tools.
Through team-based projects, learners can analyze real-world industrial PLC applications and propose improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
